body:
Heyo, some of you might not know me, some of you might. Some of you might just be a one time talk others might be everyday or often talk. 

Anyways.. I am Ludcha, i'm 14 years old. I live outside Stockholm, Sweden. I am a very sporty person and i love food and to hang out with friends. 

So, feel free to ask me a one or possibly and hopefully alot of questions! :)

title: [AMA] Ludcha

replies.body:
Hello:

  • Opinions on me? (If you have one)
  • What do you think about OCN merging with Lifeboat?
  • What do you like about Avicus?
  • What do you don't like about Avicus?
  • Do you think Avicus will grow up in player count?
  • What are your dreams in this server?
  • Who is the best pvper in the server?

replies.body:
I don't think we have talked that much so i can't really say much, sorry :(
It's quite interesting how it will end up, i hope for the goodies but anything can happen.
The community is the core of this server, so the community!
The only thing i mislike about Avicus is about the atlas update, the kills doesn't count. :(
Yeah, but it will take it's time, but certainly it will grow!
I don't know, win a tourney would be amazing!
I'm not really checking and such but Eric is a good candidate.

We don't really talk much, but you are nice and chill.
Cool team, got some ups and downs in it, but yeah it works for me :p
Nice server, great community, great pvpers and good maps ;)
